pinyin: Tai4 mi3 er3 Yi1 la1 mu3 Meng3 hu3 Jie3 fang4 Zu3 zhi1
containing_words.word: 泰米尔伊拉姆猛虎解放组织

pinyin: Tai4 mi3 er3 Meng3 hu3 Zu3 zhi1

sentences.english: In me the tiger sniffle the rose.
sentences.chinese: 我心里有猛虎在细嗅蔷薇。

sentences.english: Your mild-mannered smoke-screen hides a real tiger.
sentences.chinese: 你温和的行为下隐藏着的是一直猛虎。

sentences.english: When we came to power, a part of the country was under the LTTE jackboot .
sentences.chinese: 当我们上台后，部分国家的猛虎组织掌。

sentences.english: Well do I remember the day I saw a wild tiger.
sentences.chinese: 见到一只猛虎的那一天，我记得很清楚。

sentences.english: Neither should our distaste for the war be interpreted to mean that we support the Tamil Tigers.
sentences.chinese: 我们厌恶战争，但这并不意味着我们支持猛虎组织。

sentences.english: This is the fourth time that a human was killed by a tiger in the Sunderbans this year.
sentences.chinese: 桑德班斯单只猛虎杀死一人的事件，这是今年第四起。

sentences.english: Eight districts out of a total of 25 were under LTTE control.
sentences.chinese: 八区总有25名猛虎组织的控制之下。

sentences.english: Pluck the keen teeth from the fierce tiger's jaws.
sentences.chinese: 它到猛虎颚下将它利齿拔尽。

sentences.english: They said the Tamil Tiger would force them to overstate casualty figures.
sentences.chinese: 他们说，塔米尔猛虎组织强迫他们夸大上网数字。

sentences.english: There is indeed evidence that they shot civilians when they tried to escape.
sentences.chinese: 的确也有证据显示猛虎组织会射杀试图逃跑的人民。

sentences.english: He Xin Yong Mu day red, chronicles, tiger dragon.
sentences.chinese: 何馨藏勇沐天红，方志青云猛虎龙。

sentences.english: The world knows the Tigers to be vicious terrorists.
sentences.chinese: 世人皆知猛虎组织是残忍的恐怖分子。

sentences.english: These lofty walls which he had seen around tigers, he now beheld once more around lambs.
sentences.chinese: 他从前见过的那种圈猛虎的高墙，现在却圈着羔羊。

definition: jackal and wolf/ravenous wolf/fig. evil person/vicious tyrant
(bird species of China) northern goshawk (Accipiter gentilis)
male eagle/tercel (male falcon used in falconry)
White Tiger (the seven mansions of the west sky)/(slang) hairless female genitalia
